channel.description: Recent content in Future on Henrique Dias

item.title: Something about the future. Is it real? Does it exist?
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: A word can be a very powerful thing. A word can change lifes, a word can destroy worlds, a word can lead us to other words, a word can make us stop breathing, a word can make us lively, a word can kill us. As you can see, each word is a very special thing. But I’m not here to talk about words, am I? No, I’m not, but I’m going to start with a word: time.
